translation.en: [gruff voice] Armageddon will launch in one minute.
translation.zh: 末日危机将在一分钟后启动

translation.en: [girl] Tony, how are we gonna do this in time?
translation.zh: 托尼 我们怎样才能赶得及？

translation.en: -We need to get across that gap. -But we'll be spotted by the guards.
translation.zh: 得到对面去 我们会被发现的 肯定来不及了

translation.en: -We won't make it. -Can you just trust me?
translation.zh: 我们会被发现的 肯定来不及了 你能相信我吗？

translation.en: Honestly? No, I can't trust you.
Well, we're going anyway. Activate Magna Boots.
translation.zh: 无论如何都得过去 启动反重力靴

translation.en: Activated.
-[Tony] Look out. Guards. -[girl] Sh!
-I need eyes in the hall. -On it.
Bronson, surveillance mode.
translation.zh: 布朗森 启动监视模式

translation.en: Tony, we gotta hurry!
Locked out. Again.
This is where we're supposed to complete the mission!
translation.zh: 我们必须去到那里完成任务！

translation.en: If we get to this elevator, we can stop the countdown.
translation.zh:
如果我们能去到这个电梯那里
就能停止倒计时

translation.en: Tony, the world as we know it ends in 15 seconds.
translation.zh: 托尼 我们的世界将在15秒后毁灭

translation.en: [gruff voice] You will never stop Armageddon.
translation.zh: 你们根本阻止不了末日危机

translation.en: Run to the elevator.
Do it again!
I think you were right, Patty.
translation.zh: 帕蒂 我觉得你说得对

translation.en: About what?
We're not gonna make it.
Rat Thickskull, don't let me down.
translation.zh: 胖头鼠 别让我失望

translation.en: You know, back in my day, a card up the sleeve was called cheating.
translation.zh:
在我那个年代
在袖子里藏卡片叫“作弊”

translation.en: Morning, Dad. I'm learning a new magic trick.
translation.zh: 早上好 爸爸 我在学一个新魔术

translation.en: Oh, is that right?
I never cheat. I use creative sportsmanship.
translation.zh:
我从不作弊
我这叫“有创意的体育精神”

translation.en: [giggles] Oh, that's very clever. Where'd you get that term?
-From you. -[gasps]
From me?! Oh, no, no. That's impossible. Deception is not a part of my vocabulary. [clicks tongue]
translation.zh:
我？这不可能
 我的字典里没有“欺诈”这个词

translation.en: Don't you like your overnight oats?
translation.zh: 你不喜欢隔夜燕麦粥吗？

translation.en: Blame your dad.
Uh, excuse me. What's going on here?
translation.zh: 不好意思 这是什么情况？

translation.en: Computers, games, devices are only allowed between 4:00 and 6:00 p.m.
translation.zh:
只准在下午四点到六点之间
使用电子设备 我们都知道的

translation.en: -We know this. -She just needs it for a minute.
I'm looking for an animal photo to make my science paper look extra nice.
translation.zh:
我在找一张动物图片
提升我的科学论文的颜值

translation.en: Oh, well, as long as it's for schoolwork, then I guess it's okay.
translation.zh: 只要是为了学业 那就没关系

translation.en: As soon as she's done, we lock that up, and then please meet me in our office.
translation.zh:
她一做完就把平板锁起来
然后请你到办公室找我

translation.en: Aw, look at that cute little starfish.
[Patty] Boop.
I need your permission to download it.
translation.zh: 需要你的许可才能下载图片

translation.en: Mm-hmm. I'm very impressed with how honest you are, sweetheart.
Yep. I always wanna be super honest.
translation.zh: 过奖 百分百诚实是我的宗旨

translation.en: Just like you.
Switchsies. Thank you, my love.
translation.zh: 交换一下 谢谢 亲爱的

translation.en: -Morning, Mom. -Hey.
-Games? -I gotta practice for tonight.
translation.zh:
-游戏机？
-我得为了今晚练一练

translation.en: Do you wanna get busted?
Nobody catches Rat.
-Stop talking like Rat Thickskull. -Someday, I'm gonna be Rat Thickskull.
translation.zh: 别再用胖头鼠的语气说话了 总有一天 我会成为真正的胖头鼠

translation.en: Really?
-[fingers crack] -All right.
Authorizing Armageddon Code.
Syncing Armageddon Code.
And Armageddon Code sunk.
Oh, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! Come here.
Hey. [chuckles] What?
Happy anniversary.
Operation Fireball?
How could I forget our greatest mission yet?
translation.zh: 我怎能忘了我们至今最重要的任务？

translation.en: -You did remember. -Well, my watch did anyway.
translation.zh: 你真的记得呀 反正是我的手表记得

translation.en: We also promised that it was this anniversary
translation.zh: 我们也说好了 要在今年的纪念日

translation.en: we were finally gonna tell our kids that we're spies.
translation.zh: 告诉我们的孩子们 我们是间谍

translation.en: -Remember? -Yeah, yeah, yeah, we did.
I say we go in and say, "Tonight, we're gonna have an important talk."
translation.zh:
我建议现在就进去
说有重要的事要告诉他们

translation.en: -And I'm gonna take the lead on that. -Oh no. N… I know what you're doing.
translation.zh:
那由我来带头 我知道你在干什么
你想让我转几圈就忘了这事

translation.en: -Trying to dance your way out of this one. -I would never!
translation.zh:
我知道你在干什么
你想让我转几圈就忘了这事 -我绝不会那么做！
-真可恶！

translation.en: How dare you tango with me!
translation.zh:
-我绝不会那么做！
-真可恶！ -绝对不会！
-跟我跳探戈

translation.en: [mom] You know I love it when you dance with me.
-Let's go talk to the kids. -Okay.
-Antonio. -Hi.
Oh good. It's locked. Just making sure.
translation.zh: 很好 锁好了 我只是想确认一下

translation.en: You know better than to fry your brain with video games before school.
translation.zh:
你知道在上学之前
不能玩电子游戏搞坏你的大脑

translation.en: For breaking the rules and stealing my key,
translation.zh: 因为你违反了规定 还偷了我的钥匙

translation.en: you will have no access to any tech of any kind for the rest of the week.
translation.zh: 这个星期你不准碰任何高科技产品

translation.en: Okay. Now tell them.
Kids.
Onward to the house of learning!
-Nice leading. -We can tell 'em next year.
translation.zh:
这头带得真好 -明年再告诉他们
-我们从他们四岁起就这么说了

translation.en: -We've said that since they were four. -[dad] Here we go!
translation.zh:
-明年再告诉他们
-我们从他们四岁起就这么说了 出发啰！

translation.en: Tony keeps getting around our restrictions,
translation.zh: 托尼一直在绕过我们的限制

translation.en: so we have to ban all of their technology.
translation.zh: 必须禁止他们碰任何高科技产品

translation.en: They need time to enjoy the things they love.
translation.zh: 他们需要点时间做点他们喜欢的事

translation.en: Babe, we can't risk someone breaking into our system
translation.zh:
我们不能冒险
让别人趁机通过孩子们的设备

translation.en: through our kids' devices, okay?
translation.zh: 闯入我们的系统 明白吗？

translation.en: There are spies everywhere.
Agent Torrez. Agent Tango.
translation.zh: 托雷兹探员 谭戈探员

translation.en: Morning, Devlin.
So what's the mission for today?
An unknown group has infiltrated one of the top secret server rooms of the OSS
translation.zh:
一个未知团伙潜入了
超级间谍组织的秘密服务器房

translation.en: hidden deep inside a civilian office.
translation.zh: 它藏在一个平民办公室里

translation.en: These guys look like professionals.
Mm. We'll pay them a visit.
You know, because of our rules, at least Patty is very honest.
translation.zh:
你要知道 多亏了我们的规定
至少帕蒂很诚实

translation.en: Our restrictions make them do what is right,
translation.zh: 我们的限制让他们做正确的事

translation.en: so if we ban all of their tech, maybe they should behave even better.
translation.zh:
所以如果完全禁止他们用高科技产品
也许他们的表现会更好

translation.en: Look, all I'm saying is technology isn't doing them any favors.
translation.zh:
我的意思只是高科技产品
对他们没有任何好处

translation.en: Know what I mean?
-[beeps] -Someone's locked us out.
-Well, technology sure serves us well. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 高科技对我们确实有用

translation.en: Okay. The most optimal path of capturing them all effectively is…
translation.zh: 好 有效捕获他们所有人的最佳路径…

translation.en: is not that.
-You don't think so? -Don't be a bull in a china shop.
You know, we could have planned that just a little, babe.
translation.zh: 老婆 我们可以先计划一下的

translation.en: Maybe ask one of these guys what the passcode is or something.
translation.zh:
比如问问其中一个人
密码是什么之类的

translation.en: You think too much. It's very cute though. Okay. [strains]
translation.zh: 你想太多了 不过很可爱 好了

translation.en: You know, we can't just control our children.
translation.zh: 我们不能控制自己的孩子

translation.en: We gotta let them fail.
translation.zh: 我们得让他们尝试失败

translation.en: You know? A lot. Like we did.
translation.zh: 经历多次失败 像我们以前那样

translation.en: Through real-life experiences, absolutely, but not through their technology.
translation.zh:
通过现实生活的经验那绝对没问题
而不是通过他们的高科技产品

translation.en: I mean, video games are never a real challenge.
translation.zh: 电子游戏根本不是真正的挑战

translation.en: Wait, what's this?
-"Defeat the Heck Knight to gain access." -This should be easy for you.
translation.zh:
-“打倒赫克骑士方能进入”
-对你来说应该很容易

translation.en: Ooh. Ouch.
Well, he cheated, and two can play at that game.
translation.zh: 他作弊了 而且这游戏可以两个人玩

translation.en: Armageddon really does break into anything.
translation.zh: 这密码真的能闯入任何系统呢

translation.en: What?
This is odd.
These guys weren't actually searching for anything,
translation.zh: 这些家伙并没有在找任何东西

translation.en: so… what are they doing here?
Oh, I count four intruders. There was a fifth. That big one.
translation.zh:
这里只有四个闯入者
还有第五个 那个大个子

translation.en: [gruff voice] Armageddon is mine to claim.
-It was a trap. -Huh?
It was a trap. They're after the Armageddon Code.
translation.zh:
这是个圈套
他们的目标是末日危机密码

translation.en: -No. -Come on.
Oh, he's gone.
It's okay. Armageddon isn't stored on the watch.
translation.zh: 没关系 密码没有存在手表上

translation.en: Mom. You missed it. There was a Heck Knight. From Hyskor!
translation.zh:
妈 你错过了 刚才有个赫克骑士
《海斯科》里的！

translation.en: [kid's mom] Sweetie, wait up. Wait a minute.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 等等 等一下

translation.en: What's Hyskor?
[host] This is the final round of our trading-card tournament.
translation.zh: 这是我们收集卡锦标赛的最后一轮

translation.en: The winner will receive a free copy of Hyskor,
translation.zh: 获胜者的奖品是一份《海斯科》

translation.en: which, of course, is the sequel to the megahit video game Loskor.
translation.zh:
当然了 这是热门电子游戏
《洛斯科》的续集

translation.en: Players, are you ready?
[host] Let's play.
Lowest number wins.
Beat that.
Oh no.
Or, as Rat Thickskull would say,
translation.zh: 或者用胖头鼠的话来说

translation.en: "Tough tacos, kid."
I'm impressed.
Congratulations, Tony.
Type in your email and Hyskor will be sent to your home computer.
translation.zh:
输入你的邮箱地址
我们会把《海斯科》发过去

translation.en: Did you know the creator of Hyskor
is this crazy awesome rich guy named Rey Kingston,
translation.zh:
是由一个叫雷·金斯顿的人创作的
他特别有钱 特别厉害

translation.en: but everyone calls him by his gamer name, the King.
translation.zh:
不过所有人都叫他
游戏里的名字 “霸主”

translation.en: Check it out.
[narrator] And here is Rey Kingston to talk about how he does it.
translation.zh:
雷·金斯顿跟大家谈谈
他是怎么制作这个游戏的

translation.en: My latest game, Hyskor,
is made using my new, flawless design method.
translation.zh: 是用我新的完美设计方法制作的

translation.en: That's a glitch right there.
But, using my proprietary…
[computerized voice] VR pods.
…I'm able to design and improve the game
from the inside.
-With my mind. -[bleeping]
What?
[The King] I can make my game better so it can make you better.
translation.zh:
我可以完善我的游戏
而它则能让你们变得更好

translation.en: Will you look at that?
-Better than ever! -[kids] Whoa!
And when you apply game theory,
you can fix anything.
Do you think the game will have the mythical One Hit from Loskor?
translation.zh:
你觉得这游戏会有传说中
《洛斯科》里的“致命一击”吗？

translation.en: No. One Hit is a fable.
translation.zh: 不 “致命一击”只是个传说

translation.en: No, it isn't. Leebs and I were fighting a cheating player,
translation.zh:
不是 我和里布斯
之前在跟一个作弊的玩家对战

translation.en: and I ran out of health, but then I got a gold star,
translation.zh:
我耗尽了生命值
但后来拿到了一颗金星

translation.en: came back to life, and beat the player with One Hit.
translation.zh:
复活了 并用“致命一击”
打败了那个玩家

translation.en: That's impossible, Patty.
Hyskor's releasing at midnight, and I'm gonna play it all night long.
translation.zh:
《海斯科》会在今晚十二点推出
我要玩一整晚

translation.en: My parents would never let me stay up that late.
translation.zh: 我爸妈肯定不会让我熬到那么晚的

translation.en: We're not allowed to stay up late playing games.
translation.zh: 爸妈不准我们熬夜打游戏

translation.en: You'll never make it past Mom and Dad's restrictions.
translation.zh: 你绝不可能逃过爸妈的限制

translation.en: Not without your help.
-You shouldn't have cheated. -But I won, didn't I?
translation.zh:
-你刚才不应该作弊的
-但我赢了 不是吗？

translation.en: There's a better way to win.
But I got Hyskor. I know you wanna play too.
translation.zh:
反正我拿到了《海斯科》
我知道你也想玩

translation.en: [The King] The world is full of terrible, unfair people,
translation.zh:
这个世界满是
品行低劣、不择手段的人

translation.en: but, with the Armageddon Code, I can force them all to become good.
translation.zh:
有了末日危机密码
我可以督促他们都变成好人

translation.en: [Heck Knight] We were unable to trace the Armageddon Code
translation.zh: 我们用那个特工的手表

translation.en: through the agent's watch.
translation.zh: 没有找到末日危机密码

translation.en: But I've learned what I needed.
translation.zh: 但我掌握了我需要的信息

translation.en: The Torrezes have the code.
translation.zh: 密码在托雷兹夫妇手上

translation.en: Since it wasn't in the OSS, it must be at their home.
translation.zh:
既然它不在超级间谍组织
那肯定是在他们家里

translation.en: [Heck Knight] I will invade their home and claim the code for you.
translation.zh: 我进他们家里去 为你夺取密码

translation.en: No need.
The Torrezes just won a copy of Hyskor.
translation.zh:
托雷兹家的小孩
刚赢了一份《海斯科》

translation.en: Tonight, I'll claim the code myself.
translation.zh: 今晚 我会亲自去拿密码

translation.en: Wha… It's… It's a brand-new house. Why are the floors squeaking?!
translation.zh:
这房子是新盖的
为什么地板会吱吱作响？

translation.en: [Torrez] We picked this place for how it looks, not how it sounds.
translation.zh:
我们选这房子是看中了它的外观
不是它的声音

translation.en: No way this is gonna work.
Five minutes to midnight. Let's move.
translation.zh: 还有五分钟到十二点 快走吧

translation.en: How are we getting past the squeaky wood floor?
translation.zh: 怎样才能穿过嘎吱作响的木地板？

translation.en: I tried mapping where all the squeaks are
translation.zh: 我把有嘎吱声的位置都标了出来

translation.en: so that we can sneak past Mom and Dad's office
translation.zh: 这样我们就能偷偷溜过爸妈的办公室

translation.en: and get to the game room.
But one creak and we're goners.
translation.zh: 但只要嘎吱一声 我们就完蛋了

translation.en: -Wait for me! -Sh!
[Patty] One, two, three!
I feel like a spy.
The worst spy ever. You talk too loud.
translation.zh: 史上最差劲的间谍 你说话太大声了

translation.en: -Your map is wrong! -It's not wrong.
-[Patty] Here, give me that. -[both gasp]
[Tony] Worst spy ever.
-[Patty] Worst idea ever. -[TVs chime] We're gonna get so busted.
translation.zh: 最烂的点子 我们肯定会被逮住的

translation.en: [Tony] Dad changes his passcode every day.
-What now? -I found this in his desk earlier.
translation.zh:
-现在怎么办？
-我之前在他办公桌里找到了这个

translation.en: [Patty] You have no soul.
Hyskor's downloading. Now we wait.
translation.zh: 《海斯科》正在下载 我们等着

translation.en: We are dealing with a highly intelligent enemy
translation.zh: 我们面对的是高度智能化的敌人

translation.en: who knows about the Armageddon Code.
translation.zh: 他们知道末日危机密码的事

translation.en: It's time we consider deleting it.
translation.zh: 是时候考虑删除密码了

translation.en: Out of the question.
The code can break into any device on the planet.
translation.zh: 这个密码可以侵入地球上的任何设备

translation.en: Yes. Yes. He's right, babe.
Think of the times we've used it to save the world. This is our greatest tool.
translation.zh:
想想我们多少次用它来拯救了世界
它是我们最强大的工具

translation.en: It's also the world's greatest threat.
translation.zh: 它也是对这个世界最大的威胁

translation.en: If there was the slightest chance of someone taking it,
translation.zh:
如果有人能抢走密码
哪怕机会再渺茫

translation.en: we agreed we would erase it.
translation.zh: 我们都得删除它 这是我们说好的

translation.en: Your orders are to protect the code until we find a solution. No exceptions.
translation.zh:
你们的任务是保护密码
直到我们找到解决办法 不能破例

translation.en: What? He's right.
Do not look at me like that.
Or like that.
That's not so bad.
Download complete. Get ready for the ultimate game experience.
translation.zh:
下载完成 准备好
享受终极游戏体验吧

translation.en: What if using Dad's passcode opens up some kind of reverse access
translation.zh:
万一用爸爸的密码
打开了某种逆向通道

translation.en: where someone can break into our system?
translation.zh:
让外人能闯入我们家的系统
那怎么办？

translation.en: Do you wanna play or not? One button-press away.
translation.zh: 你到底想不想玩？只需按一下按钮

translation.en: [whispers] We'll be in so much trouble.
Worth it.
-Okay, do it. Wait. Don't do it. -[game music playing]
translation.zh: 好吧 按 等等 别按

translation.en: [game] Welcome to Hyskor.
Reach the end of the world
and defeat the last player standing to win the crown.
translation.zh: 打败最后一位玩家 赢取王冠

translation.en: -Choose your character. -I pick Florella.
translation.zh:
选择你的角色 -弗洛瑞拉
-你还选她呀？

translation.en: -You're playing her still? -But she's so cool.
translation.zh:
-弗洛瑞拉
-你还选她呀？ 她很酷 而且随着游戏深入
她会越来越厉害

translation.en: She gets better as you work through the game.
translation.zh:
她很酷 而且随着游戏深入
她会越来越厉害

translation.en: -I would've won by then. -With Rat Thickskull?
Good luck. He's a jerk.
translation.zh: 祝好运 他是个混蛋

translation.en: No. He's the most ruthless, scheming, roguish rascal in the whole game.
translation.zh:
不 他是整个游戏中
最无情、最有心计、最狡猾的无赖

translation.en: And no one plays him better than I do.
translation.zh: 而且没有人比我更会玩这个角色

translation.en: Okay, we, uh… We…
-We move the code. We hide it. -It's a threat no matter where we hide it.
translation.zh:
-我们转移密码 把它藏起来
-不管藏在哪里 它都是一个威胁

translation.en: It's always been that way, ever since you created it.
translation.zh: 自从你创造它以来 一直如此

translation.en: -We need to delete it now, Terrence. -No. N…
No, we just keep all home devices locked under maximum security.
translation.zh:
我们只需要把家里的所有设备
用最严密的安保措施锁起来

translation.en: Ours, the kids'.
People are always going to be after the code.
translation.zh: 人们永远都会想得到这个密码

translation.en: So you wanna just lock up our kids' lives forever?
translation.zh:
难道你想把我们孩子的生活
永远封锁起来吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
[Terrence] Babe. Uh…
I'm sorry. Just… We… We…
-We have to do this, you know? -Mm.
translation.zh: 我们必须这么做 你明白吗？

translation.en: It's better for them, for all of us.
translation.zh: 这么做对我们大家都好

translation.en: -Thank you for understanding. -Mm-hmm.
Did you just sleeper-kiss me?
translation.zh: 你刚刚给我下了催眠药？

translation.en: I'm sorry, babe.
But this is better for all of us.
translation.zh: 但这么做对我们所有人都好

translation.en: Proceed with deletion of Armageddon Code.
translation.zh: 继续删除末日危机密码

translation.en: I'm gonna beat this game so fast.
translation.zh: 我很快就能打败这个游戏

translation.en: The King said that only good people can beat his games.
translation.zh:
霸主说了
只有好人才能打败他的游戏

translation.en: -I am good. -That's not what I meant.
[Patty] If you cheat like a rat,
translation.zh: 如果你像老鼠一样作弊

translation.en: you will lose like a rat.
For real.
[Patty] There's something wrong with this game.
I know that face.
Thank you.
[Tony] I know that voice.
What's he doing?
Ninety-seven,
ninety-eight,
ninety-nine…
Wait, what?
What? It just shut down.
We should leave.
I agree.
-Wait, how did… -[high-pitched trill]
-Armageddon Code is gone? -Deleted.
translation.zh:
-末日危机密码不见了？
-被删除了

translation.en: Good. It should have been done a lo--
translation.zh: 这是好事 早就该这么…

translation.en: Not deleted.
Stolen.
-What? -Right out from under us.
[Terrence] It's not erased, and it's not here.
translation.zh:
密码绝对不是被删除的
它绝对不在这里

translation.en: -[Torrez] You're not looking hard enough. -[Terrence] Maybe the kids did something.
translation.zh: 或许只是因为你没有仔细找 没准孩子们搞了什么鬼

translation.en: [Torrez] Why are you always blaming the kids? They are very obedient.
translation.zh: 你为什么总是怪孩子们？他们非常乖

translation.en: Have you met our son?
[Torrez] Yes! And they are asleep in their beds.
translation.zh:
当然了解 而且他们正在床上睡觉
我亲眼看到的

translation.en: -I saw it with my own eyes. -[Terrence] I'm gonna check.
translation.zh:
当然了解 而且他们正在床上睡觉
我亲眼看到的 我最好去看看

translation.en: -[Torrez] Oh, are you? -[Terrence] Yeah!
Tony.
Right.
That can't be our fault.
Maybe someone stole his credit card or something.
translation.zh: 也许他的信用卡什么的被偷了

translation.en: We should go to bed.
But what if we did something bad?
translation.zh: 万一我们做了坏事怎么办？

translation.en: Worth it.
-[alarm ringing] -♪ Wake up, sleepyhead! ♪
♪ Wake up! ♪
Something is happening.
It's all over the world.
translation.zh: 这游戏现在遍及全世界

translation.en: -[whirs] -[game narrator] Hyskor challenge.
-Survive the perilous jump to gain access. -What is this, a game?
translation.zh:
-完成危险跳跃才能进入
-这是什么？游戏吗？

translation.en: -[character screams] -[narrator] Access denied.
That's Hyskor, Dad. A game. But I can beat it.
translation.zh:
爸 这是《海斯科》
一个游戏 但我能赢

translation.en: -[narrator] Access granted. -Good job, bud.
translation.zh: 准许进入 干得好 伙计

translation.en: Oh, the news is back on.
As of early this morning, large populations of the world
translation.zh: 从今天早晨开始 全世界有许多人

translation.en: are suddenly being forced to play games
to gain access to their daily life.
translation.zh: 才能继续他们的日常生活

translation.en: Reports show people are being locked in or out of their smart cars, smart homes,
translation.zh:
报告称人们的智能车
智能家居被锁 让他们不得进出

translation.en: and they have to complete fantasy game tasks
translation.zh: 他们必须完成奇幻的游戏任务

translation.en: to unlock even the simplest device.
translation.zh: 才能解锁最简单的设备

translation.en: I'm trying to get into my bank account, but I have to fight this Heck Knight.
translation.zh:
我想查看我的银行账户
但我必须跟这个赫克骑士战斗

translation.en: I don't know what the heck a Heck Knight is.
translation.zh: 我都不知道他是什么玩意儿

translation.en: [reporter] What's going on over here?
-We can't beat the game. -That's my friend Leebs!
translation.zh:
-我们赢不了这个游戏
-是里布斯！

translation.en: -[game narrator] Access denied. -Now we're locked out of our home.
translation.zh:
-拒绝进入
-现在我们被锁在家门外

translation.en: [reporter] Half of the planet has been affected by this virus, and experts agree that if it goes global,
translation.zh:
地球上一半的人都受到了影响
专家们说 如果该病毒传遍全球

translation.en: the world as we know it could end.
translation.zh: 我们的世界可能会终结

translation.en: It's like somebody combined a video-game virus with--
translation.zh: 这就像有人把一个电子游戏病毒跟…

translation.en: The Armageddon Code.
-I think someone's trying to break in. -Come here.
-Someone else is in control. -[grunting]
-[kids scream] -Go to the corner!
These are all enemies from Hyskor.
translation.zh: 这些全是来自《海斯科》的坏人

translation.en: [Tony] Dad and Mom are actually cool!
translation.zh: 爸爸和妈妈其实很酷呢

translation.en: Tony, play Hyskor to open the lock.
translation.zh: 托尼 玩《海斯科》来开锁

translation.en: No, you do it. I'm watching this.
Dad, don't fight that guy. He's one of the toughest in the game!
translation.zh:
爸 别跟那家伙打
他是游戏中最难对付的坏人之一

translation.en: That's my TV!
Yes. I beat the game!
translation.zh: 太好了 我赢了游戏！

translation.en: -You okay, baby? -I had it under control.
-Come on, go! -[Terrence] Go, go, go!
-What are these things? -Bad guys from our favorite video game.
translation.zh:
-这些是什么？
-我们最喜欢的电子游戏里的坏人

translation.en: [Terrence] That doesn't explain the living skeletons in my pool.
translation.zh: 我泳池里的活骷髅是怎么回事？

translation.en: -Car. Ah! -No, no, no, no.
translation.zh:
车子 -不 去安全屋
-那是我的车！

translation.en: -That's my car! -Safe house, safe house.
translation.zh:
-不 去安全屋
-那是我的车！

translation.en: [Torrez] Right, right. Let's go. Go on.
translation.zh: 对 我们走 快走

translation.en: [Patty] But I liked that car! -[Tony] We'll get another one. -[glass shattering]
translation.zh:
-我很喜欢那辆车！
-可以再买一辆

translation.en: -Where are we going? -[Torrez] Follow your dad.
translation.zh:
-我们去哪里？
-跟着爸爸 快

translation.en: All right, listen. Kids, your mother and I are, uh…
translation.zh:
好了 听着 孩子们
你们的妈妈和我是…

translation.en: Your dad and I have special jobs.
translation.zh: 爸爸跟我的工作很特殊

translation.en: You're about to see some mind-blowing technology
translation.zh: 你们将看到令人惊叹的高科技产品

translation.en: that might surprise you.
translation.zh: 可能会让你们大吃一惊

translation.en: [Patty] That's a wall.
Why isn't the secret door working? Oh, no power.
translation.zh: 暗门怎么不动了？没电了

translation.en: [Tony] Is this a dad joke?
-Manual override. -Manual override.
-We have a secret door? -Ta-da!
[Nora] What?!
-[Torrez] Come on. -Me first?
-[Terrence] Yeah. -Whoa! Where does this go to?
-A room full of candy! -Let's go, honey.
[Tony] Is it safe?
-Completely. Why didn't we test this out? -We meant to.
translation.zh:
-绝对安全 我们为什么没有测试过？
-本来打算测试的

translation.en: [Patty] Hey, I don't see any candy!
-Whoa! -Yeah. Pretty cool, huh? [Terrence] Your chariot awaits.
translation.zh: 对 挺酷的吧？您的座驾恭候莅临

translation.en: -Watch your head. -[seat belts click]
Great.
-Do we drive this? -Absolutely not.
The autopilot is designed to take you to a safe house. Press the start button.
translation.zh:
自动驾驶仪会带你们去安全屋
按下开始按钮

translation.en: [game] Complete the challenge to gain access.
It's asking if we're one or two players. This has to be a trick.
translation.zh:
它在问我们是一人还是二人
这肯定是个陷阱

translation.en: -[Tony] This is Hyskor. Let's beat it. -[Torrez] Why don't we just tap through?
translation.zh: 是《海斯科》 我们来打败它 我按一按 让它过去

translation.en: No, no. Could be a red wire-blue wire situation.
translation.zh: 不行 搞不好会出人命的

translation.en: -[Torrez] Seriously? -Yes, seriously!
Done.
Patty, get to the safe house.
There's something inside I need you to protect.
translation.zh:
里面有个很重要的东西
我需要你保护它

translation.en: -[Patty] How do I find it? -It'll find you.
translation.zh:
我怎么能找到它？ 它自然会出现
在我们到达之前保管好它

translation.en: Just keep it safe till we get there.
translation.zh:
它自然会出现
在我们到达之前保管好它

translation.en: Wear this tracker so that we can locate you. Syncing.
translation.zh:
戴上这个追踪器
我们就能找到你们 正在同步

translation.en: Stay safe,
and don't trust anybody.
-We don't wanna go without you! -[Torrez] You'll be safe. See you later.
translation.zh:
-我们想跟你们一起去！
-你们会很安全的 稍后见

translation.en: Babe!
Mom!
Dad!
-No! -[Terrence] Kids!
-No! -[Patty] Tony. Tony!
No! Stay away from them!
[Patty] Mom! Dad!
No!
[Tony] You're a much better driver than Dad.
translation.zh: 你开车已经开得比爸爸好很多了

translation.en: [Patty] I'm not driving!
[Tony] Bad guys up ahead!
They're chasing after us!
-[Tony] Tell this thing to go faster! -[Patty] Go faster!
translation.zh: 让这车开快一点！ 开快一点！

translation.en: [Patty] They're up to something!
They're hacking our autopilot.
translation.zh: 他们想黑掉我们的自动驾驶仪

translation.en: It's driving us to where the bad guys want us to go.
translation.zh: 它在把我们带去坏人指定的地方

translation.en: We gotta go manual and get to the safe house ourselves.
translation.zh: 我们必须手动操作 自己开去安全屋

translation.en: -Keep it on the road! -Whoa, check this out.
translation.zh: 在路上开！ 哇 你看看这个

translation.en: The anti-crash bounces us right off obstacles.
translation.zh: 防撞装置会把我们从障碍物上弹开

translation.en: This thing controls just like that game Mecha Wings.
translation.zh:
这车的操控方式
跟《机甲之翼》游戏一样

translation.en: Give me that.
I'm the best at Mecha Wings.
[Tony] You're going too fast!
-[Tony] He's got us! -Oh yeah?
We gotta lose them, or they'll follow us to the safe house.
translation.zh:
必须摆脱他们
否则他们会跟着我们去到安全屋

translation.en: -Look out! -[screams]
How about some of this?
You're going right into them!
-That's the idea. -What?!
Just like Mecha Wings.
Turn there.
[Patty] You're going the wrong way.
That was kind of impressive, Patty.
translation.zh: 帕蒂 你刚才的表现挺了不起的

translation.en: Thank you.
Now let's just hope this "safe house" is actually safe.
translation.zh: 希望这个“安全屋”真的安全

translation.en: Wait a second.
I'm about to be really smart.
I think Mom and Dad
are spies.
You think?
We did something wrong.
This can't be it.
[Tony] So Mom and Dad are spies, and they sent us to the middle of nowhere?
translation.zh:
爸妈是间谍
还让我们来到了荒山野岭？

translation.en: -[Tony] This must be a joke. -[Patty] Then why am I not laughing?
translation.zh:
-他们肯定是在开玩笑
-那我为什么没有笑？

translation.en: [Patty] The water is so nice… and brown.
translation.zh: 湖水真不错…而且是土黄色的

translation.en: [Tony] Maybe we jump in.
[Patty] After you.
[electronic voice] Your name?
Uh, Patty Torrez.
Tony Torrez.
Your full name, please.
Uh, Patty Tango-Torrez?
My dad's last name is Tango, and my mom's is Torrez.
translation.zh: 我爸姓谭戈 我妈姓托雷兹

translation.en: -Your full name. -We never use our full names.
translation.zh:
-说出你的全名
-我们从来都不用全名

translation.en: They're too long.
Your full name, please.
Patricia Angelita Sorrow Feliz Rhiannon Tango-Torrez.
translation.zh:
帕蒂丽夏·安吉丽塔·索罗·菲利兹
瑞安农·谭戈-托雷兹

translation.en: Antonio Joaquin Cecilio Rogue Amadeus Tango-Torrez.
translation.zh:
安托尼奥·华金·塞西里奥·罗格
阿玛迪斯·谭戈-托雷兹

translation.en: -[bleeping] -[Patty] The safe house is underwater?
[Tony] Either that or it drowned.
translation.zh: 不是在水下就是被淹了

translation.en: It's empty.
[Tony] This place is a dump.
-[both gasp] -Hey, kiddos.
We couldn't wait to show you the safe house when you were old enough.
translation.zh:
我们都等不及你们快快长大
带你们来这个安全屋了

translation.en: If you're here now and by yourselves,
translation.zh: 如果你们现在独自来到了这里

translation.en: that means something has gone terribly wrong.
translation.zh: 那就意味发生了非常糟糕的事

translation.en: But don't you worry. Mom and Dad are very close.
translation.zh: 但别担心 爸爸和妈妈就在不远处

translation.en: And if you haven't guessed yet,
translation.zh: 如果你们还没猜到的话

translation.en: your father and I are spies.
translation.zh: 你们的爸爸和我其实是间谍

translation.en: -Whoa! -Whoa!
Hopefully, we will see you soon so we can explain everything.
translation.zh:
希望我们很快能见面
我们就能向你们解释一切

translation.en: In the meantime,
choose your activity.
There's comfort for sleep…
-Cozy beds! -I get the top bunk.
…food for nourishment…
A little kitchen and snacks.
…gadget tutorials for a competitive edge…
translation.zh: 提升战斗力的小装备教程

translation.en: [Patty] Spy gadgets!
This place is amazing!
…and spy training modules for self-defense.
translation.zh: 还有学习自卫术的间谍训练模块

translation.en: -[Terrence] Stand here. -Spy training!
-I'm gonna be the best spy ever. -[beep]
translation.zh: 我要成为史上最优秀的间谍

translation.en: Tony!
Hello.
-Move over. I'm coming down. -[Terrence] Lesson one complete.
translation.zh: 挪开 我要下去了 第一课完成 永远要留意陷阱

translation.en: Always look out for traps.
translation.zh: 第一课完成 永远要留意陷阱

translation.en: [Tony] Look at this place.
[Terrence] Lesson two, ambush.
"Ambush Alley."
This is easy.
Just like a video game.
translation.zh: 就像在电子游戏里一样

translation.en: Hee-hee. You did it!
[Terrence] Almost good.
I'm gonna try this one.
Avoid the lasers or you'll trip the alarm.
translation.zh: 避开激光 否则会触发警报

translation.en: Okay. Your turn.
-[grunts] -Failure!
Please try again.
Failure.
How come when you mess up, I get hit?
translation.zh: 为什么你搞砸了却是我挨揍？

translation.en: Um… because we're a team?
Let me try.
Failure.
Smart training system.
-Let's go upstairs and do gadgets. -Okay.
translation.zh: 我们上楼去玩那些装备吧 好

translation.en: -Let's find a way out. -[groans]
Oh, did they hurt you, my love?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 他们把你打伤了？

translation.en: No. No, no, no. They didn't.
The sleeper kiss is what leaves the lingering pain.
translation.zh: 是催眠之吻造成的挥之不去的痛

translation.en: I had to delete it.
-I know. -Okay. Then let's break outta here.
translation.zh:
-我知道
-好 那我们逃出去吧

translation.en: -Oh. -I'm gonna say that's a trap.
At least we get to meet whoever's behind this. Come on.
translation.zh: 至少我们能见到幕后黑手

translation.en: -So you're just gonna-- -Come on!
I'm sure they're gonna let us waltz right into where they are.
translation.zh:
我敢肯定他们会让我们
轻松走进他们的密室

translation.en: This is why we get in trouble.
-You're impulsive. -Just stay close.
I am just asking you to use a little caution.
translation.zh: 我只是提醒你小心一点

translation.en: Stay close.
[Terrence] Come on.
-[Nora] Hear that? -Yeah.
One, two, three.
-That's ominous. -Yeah.
-[Terrence] Very interesting. -[Torrez] Uh-huh.
Hi.
Uh, excuse our appearance. We didn't realize it was Fantasy Friday here.
translation.zh:
我们衣着太普通了 不好意思
我们不知道今天玩“奇幻周五”

translation.en: [Terrence] Nice architecture, by the way. Very, uh… retro video gamey.
translation.zh: 对了 这栋建筑很漂亮 很有…复古游戏的风格

translation.en: As far as I'm concerned,
the late 20th century was the height
of visual technology.
It was all downhill from there.
translation.zh: 从那以后就走下坡路了

translation.en: Please sit down.
Oh, there…
Trust me.
So, Rey Kingston,
one of the most powerful tech giants in all of history,
translation.zh: 人类有史以来最强大的科技巨头

translation.en: using a virus to force everyone to play video games. Why?
translation.zh:
利用一个病毒强迫所有人
玩电子游戏 为什么？

translation.en: Well, the only true benefit in gaining power
translation.zh: 获得权力唯一真正的好处

translation.en: is to influence the world.
There's no better way to do that than through your Armageddon Code.
translation.zh:
没有比你们的末日危机密码
更适合的方式了

translation.en: And you shut off half the world with it. Happy?
translation.zh: 可你用它关闭了半个世界 满意吗？

translation.en: No, I'm not.
Yeah, Armageddon was supposed to allow Hyskor to break into every device on the planet.
translation.zh:
这个密码本该能让《海斯科》
入侵地球上的所有设备

translation.en: So why has it stopped halfway?
translation.zh: 可它为什么进行了一半就停了？

translation.en: -Try turning it off and back on? -That works.
translation.zh:
-尝试一下关机再开机？
-挺管用的

translation.en: [Torrez] Maybe just give it a smack.
Take it out… [blows] …right back in.
-You're not gonna help me fix it, are you? -Not a chance.
translation.zh: 看来你们不会帮我解决这个问题 没门儿

translation.en: There's other ways.
For the longest time,
I've wanted to challenge both of you to a duel.
translation.zh: 我一直想跟你们两个一起决斗

translation.en: -Why us? -I mean, are we that good?
translation.zh:
-为什么选我们？
-我们有那么厉害吗？

translation.en: No.
You're not good at all.
If you win, you go free.
translation.zh: 如果你们赢了 你们可以离开

translation.en: If I win, you fix the code.
translation.zh: 我赢了 你们必须修正密码

translation.en: Let's do this.
Sorry.
Babe!
The code I stole was complete.
translation.zh: 我窃取的密码原本是完整的

translation.en: You must have split it the moment I took it from your home.
translation.zh:
我从你们家拿走它时
你们肯定把它分成了两半

translation.en: Babe!
Failsafe mechanism, huh? To ensure it doesn't fall into the wrong hands?
translation.zh:
这是故障保险机制？
确保它不会落入坏人之手？

translation.en: Wear this tracker so that we can locate you.
translation.zh: 戴上这个追踪器 我们就能找到你们

translation.en: So if her necklace is a tracker…
translation.zh: 如果她的项链是追踪器

translation.en: Your kids have the missing piece, don't they?
translation.zh:
那缺失的一半
就在你们的孩子手上 对吗？

translation.en: Stay away from my kids!
-Careful! -[Torrez panting]
Is this all just a game to you?
translation.zh: 这一切对你只是个游戏

translation.en: It is.
And with game theory, anything can be fixed,
translation.zh:
用我的游戏理论
任何事物都能被修复

translation.en: even this sorry world.
translation.zh: 连这个可悲的世界也可以

translation.en: Maybe your children will be a little more helpful than you.
translation.zh: 也许你们的孩子会比你们更有帮助

translation.en: Let's find out.
[Patty] I get the top bunk now.
Spy fashion!
[Patty] We have all the time in the world!
Patty! It's a spy-suit generator.
[Tony] I'm gonna try it.
[Patty] Maybe we should read the instructions first.
translation.zh: 也许我们应该先看看说明书

translation.en: Tony!
Oh no. You're a pancake.
Let me try!
[Tony] The world's coolest sister.
[Terrence] Failure. Please try again.
Failure. Try again.
Super goop.
Sticks to anything
once activated.
[Tony] What is that thing?
It says it's a "thought bubble."
Looks like you select an emotion
translation.zh: 应该是你选择一种情绪

translation.en: and, boom, your enemy is either laughing, crying, hungry…
translation.zh:
扔出去 你的敌人
就会大笑、大哭、饥饿…

translation.en: "Cute overload"?
[Tony] Gadgets are weird.
Ambush.
Almost good.
Wait a minute. I just remembered something.
translation.zh: 等一下 我想了起一件事

translation.en: Mom told me that there was something very important here,
translation.zh: 妈妈跟我说过这里有个很重要的东西

translation.en: but that it would find me.
Aw! Look at you!
You're my favorite thing in the world now.
translation.zh: 你现在是我最爱的小玩意儿了

translation.en: I'm gonna call you
Bronson.
How To Be A Spy, author unknown.
"A good spy is a master of deception"?
"All spying is based on lies"?
translation.zh: “所有间谍活动都以谎言为基础”？

translation.en: Really?
This book is awesome.
Mom and Dad's job is to lie and break the rules.
translation.zh: 爸妈的工作就是撒谎以及违反规则

translation.en: I don't care if it's their job.
translation.zh: 我不管那是不是他们的工作

translation.en: They tell us to be honest, but they weren't with us.
translation.zh: 他们让我们坦诚 可他们却骗我们

translation.en: It proves that telling the truth only gets you in trouble.
translation.zh: 事实证明 说实话只会让人惹上麻烦

translation.en: That's crazy. Telling the truth should never be a bad thing.
translation.zh: 胡说八道 说真话绝不该是一件坏事

translation.en: Oh yeah? Look here.
"A good spy never tells the truth."
I'll never be a spy then.
Have fun with that.
I wish Mom and Dad were here now.
translation.zh: 真希望爸妈现在就在这里

translation.en: Well, they're not.
They're out spying.
-Tony, what if this was all our fault? -How?
translation.zh:
-托尼 如果这都是我们造成的呢？
-怎么会呢？

translation.en: You downloaded Hyskor last night,
and then it was all over the news, taking over the world.
translation.zh: 后来它就上了新闻 开始攻占全世界

translation.en: I guess that makes sense.
translation.zh: 你这么一说还挺有道理的

translation.en: Since we caused this game apocalypse, then we should fix it.
translation.zh:
既然是我们造成了这场游戏大灾难
就该由我们来弥补

translation.en: You mean take down the final boss? Like Rat Thickskull?
translation.zh:
你是说扳倒大反派？
就像胖头鼠一样？

translation.en: No, I'm saying that we save Mom and Dad
translation.zh: 不 我是说我们去救爸妈

translation.en: so that they can stop the bad guys and save the world.
translation.zh: 好让他们能阻止坏人 拯救世界

translation.en: That's the craziest idea I've ever heard.
translation.zh: 那是我听过的最疯狂的想法

translation.en: So let's do it.
[woman] Children!
We're your parents' coworkers.
translation.zh: 我们是你们父母的同事

translation.en: Mom said not to trust anyone.
translation.zh: 妈妈说过不要相信任何人

translation.en: -I say take 'em down. -What if they really are secret agents?
translation.zh:
-我认为要干掉他们
-万一他们真的是特工呢？

translation.en: We can apologize later.
Children?
You're our parents' coworkers?
translation.zh: 你们是我们父母的同事？

translation.en: -So you're spies? -Yes.
We are here to protect you.
Well, according to your manual, a good spy never tells the truth.
translation.zh:
根据你们的手册
优秀的间谍从不说真话

translation.en: So we don't trust you.
We gotta go right now. You're not safe here.
translation.zh: 我们得走了 你们在这里不安全

translation.en: But it's a safe house.
That's it.
Careful.
They might have gadgets.
Here they come.
They could use some serious training.
translation.zh: 他们需要认真训练一下

translation.en: Yup.
Spy training.
-[Terrence] Stand here. -Ah!
Trap door! Failure.
Avoid the lasers or you'll trip the alarm.
translation.zh: 避开激光 否则会触发警报

translation.en: Failure.
Sorry. Try again.
[gasps] Thanks, Bronson. Now find us another exit.
translation.zh:
谢谢你 布朗森
现在给我们找另一个出口

translation.en: [Tony] Watch your step.
Try harder.
[Patty] You two look… hungry.
[Patty] Thanks, Bronson. Now let's get out of here before they eat the whole safe house.
translation.zh:
谢谢 布朗森 在他们吃掉
所有东西之前 我们赶紧离开

translation.en: -[Patty] Mine. -[Tony] Boop.
[Patty] Come on, Bronson! You're part of the team.
translation.zh: 加油 布朗森！你是团队的一员

translation.en: [Patty] Too easy.
Yes!
[man] Nice try, kids.
I'm Devlin, OSS division.
translation.zh: 我是超级间谍组织的德夫林

translation.en: Your parents work for me.
We don't believe you.
Trust me.
Oops.
-You're coming with us. -[Tony] Huh? Oh.
We didn't know.
[Tony] He has two pairs of sunglasses. He's definitely a spy.
translation.zh: 他有两副墨镜 绝对是个间谍

translation.en: Hey! Watch the gadgets.
[Tony] There are no video games in this truck.
translation.zh: 这辆卡车里没有电子游戏

translation.en: [Patty] Oh, look, in case anyone ever wonders where all the spies are.
translation.zh:
你看 这是怕别人
不知道间谍都在哪儿呢

translation.en: [Devlin] Everything is a mess. Half the world got hit by a game virus.
translation.zh:
世界大乱了 全球有半数地区
遭到了一个游戏病毒的袭击

translation.en: Some things are working. Some aren't.
translation.zh: 有些设备还能运作 有些已经瘫痪了

translation.en: Yeah, we noticed.
Cool spy boat.
That's actually a plane
that's also a boat.
It's complicated, kid.
It's one of our only vehicles that hasn't been locked down.
translation.zh:
也是我们少数
没有被锁定的交通工具之一

translation.en: An OSS Super Ducky.
Why is it so small?
Fits one adult. It's called secrecy.
translation.zh: 只能坐一个成年人 这叫低调行事

translation.en: And secrecy is how we protect the world from our enemies.
translation.zh:
我们必须深藏不露 才能保护世界
免遭敌人的攻击

translation.en: Now, come on. We're in a hurry.
[Patty] Well, maybe we wouldn't have so many enemies
translation.zh: 如果政府不是一直在监视

translation.en: if we weren't spying all the time.
translation.zh: 或许我们就不会有这么多敌人

translation.en: [Devlin] Nice dream, kid.
translation.zh: 这个梦真美好 孩子

translation.en: Our entire system's been locked up for the past 12 hours.
translation.zh:
过去12小时
我们的整个系统都被封锁了

translation.en: We can't access anything at all.
How do we find our parents?
translation.zh: 怎样能找到我们的父母？

translation.en: You got your vehicle working and escaped your house,
translation.zh:
你们的车能用
而且你们还从家里逃了出来

translation.en: so we think you two have what it takes to help.
translation.zh: 所以我们认为你们有能力帮我们

translation.en: You want us to be real spies?
translation.zh: 你要我们当真正的间谍？

translation.en: Don't get carried away.
I just want you to beat this video game so we can access our systems.
translation.zh:
我只希望你们打通这个游戏
让我们能进入系统

translation.en: Take off the kids' cuffs so they can do what they do best. Play games.
translation.zh:
解开他们的手铐 让他们
做他们最擅长的事 玩游戏

translation.en: -But they're dangerous, sir. -Just… Off, please.
translation.zh:
-可是长官 他们很危险
-就…解开吧 谢了

translation.en: -I told you games would come in handy. -Okay. Get in there, kid.
translation.zh:
-我就说玩游戏能派上用场的
-得了 快开始吧

translation.en: We could never get past that part. Wow. That is great, kid.
translation.zh: 我们一直卡在了这一关 太棒了

translation.en: That is… That's great.
I'll take over from here.
-I wouldn't do that. -Me neither.
translation.zh:
-要是我就不会那么干
-我也不会

translation.en: I've played a few video games in my day.
translation.zh: 我可是玩过一些电子游戏的

translation.en: You ever heard of GoldenEye? Watch this.
translation.zh: 听说过《黄金眼》吗？看好了

translation.en: All right, just, uh…
get it done.
The system's back online. Yeah, that's good work, kid.
translation.zh:
系统重新上线了
好 孩子 你干得很好

translation.en: All right. Now we can start searching for leads.
translation.zh: 好 现在可以开始寻找线索

translation.en: Let's go, people. I wanna see some names.
translation.zh: 大家加油 我要看到具体的名字

translation.en: Mom told me there was something hidden at the safe house.
translation.zh: 妈妈跟我说安全屋里藏着一个东西

translation.en: -Do you have something important, Bronson? -[Bronson chitters]
translation.zh: 布朗森 你有什么重要的东西吗？

translation.en: [Devlin] The Armageddon Code.
But only a piece of it?
Oh. Your parents were smart to split the code.
translation.zh: 你们的父母很聪明 把代码一分为二

translation.en: This gives us a fighting chance.
What happens if the bad guy gets both pieces?
translation.zh: 要是坏人把两半都拿到手会怎样？

translation.en: Your parents are only authorized to use that piece.
translation.zh: 你们的父母只有权使用那一半

translation.en: If the enemy combines them,
translation.zh: 如果敌人把两半结合起来

translation.en: he'd infect every device in the world with his game virus.
translation.zh:
他就能用他的游戏病毒
控制全世界的电子设备

translation.en: He'd be king of the planet.
The King.
Devlin, we might know who your bad guy is.
translation.zh: 德夫林 我们可能知道那个坏人是谁

translation.en: Who?
[agent] Unauthorized access. Oh!
-[computer beeping] -Here it is.
[Tony] Rey Kingston. But everyone knows him as the King.
translation.zh: 雷·金斯顿 但所有人都叫他“霸主”

translation.en: Someone broke into our parents' system and stole Armageddon.
translation.zh:
昨晚有人闯入了我们父母的系统
偷走了密码

translation.en: It could only have been the King.
His new game, Hyskor, is what you're seeing
on every device across the world.
translation.zh: 入侵了全世界的电子设备

translation.en: The FBI already raided his game studio this morning,
translation.zh:
联调局今早已经
突击搜查了他的游戏工作室

translation.en: but it was empty, and this King was nowhere to be found.
translation.zh:
但里面是空的
而且霸主已经不知去向

translation.en: Well, in his games, he always hides the bad guy in a cool, secret lair.
translation.zh:
在他的游戏里 他总会把坏人
藏在一个很酷的秘密巢穴里

translation.en: People, how do we find him? I want suggestions.
translation.zh: 我们怎么找到他？我需要你们的建议

translation.en: Well, my mom gave me this to track us.
translation.zh: 我妈妈给了我这个来追踪我们

translation.en: So maybe we reverse-track her tracker?
translation.zh: 或许我们可以反向追踪她的追踪器？

translation.en: That must be where your parents are located.
translation.zh: 这个肯定是你们父母所在的地点

translation.en: And quite possibly
the King.
-Somebody else is in control. -It means the bad guys are gonna break in.
translation.zh:
-有人控制了这里
-其实只是说明坏人快闯进来了

translation.en: From there, there, and there.
translation.zh: 从那里、那里 还有那里

translation.en: -What? -Trust me.
-We've learned from experience. -Know how much money I pay for security?
translation.zh:
-这是我们的经验教训
-知道这里的安保花了我多少钱吗？

translation.en: There's one!
[Devlin] Get Armageddon out of here!
Protect the code!
Mom told us that we have to keep this safe until she finds us.
translation.zh:
妈妈说过在她找到我们之前
我们必须保管好这个

translation.en: Lasers.
Ambush.
Go!
-Whoa! Did you see that? -See what happens if you kick 'em.
translation.zh:
-你看到了吗？
-踢他们看看会怎样

translation.en: It did it again.
[Devlin] Give me that!
Let the grown-ups handle this.
[Heck Knight] Give me the code.
[Patty] They're getting away!
-We need to find out where they're going. -Bronson, we need eyes on the Heck Knight.
translation.zh:
-我们得查出他们要去哪里
-布朗森 监视赫克骑士

translation.en: Devlin! Get up and go chase them!
translation.zh: 德夫林！快起来去追他们！

translation.en: You…
The bad guys are escaping on the lake.
We'll never catch them.
translation.zh: 我们绝不可能抓到他们的

translation.en: [Tony] You can do the driving.
But only OSS agents know how to drive this.
translation.zh: 可只有超级间谍组织的特工会开这个

translation.en: -[engine revs] -Thanks, Bronson!
[Tony] I just remembered I get seasick.
They're getting away!
Our boat can't swim.
Yeah, well, their boats can't fly.
translation.zh: 对 可他们的船不能飞

translation.en: Bronson, airborne mode.
[Patty] Bronson, here's the location we got from the necklace.
translation.zh:
布朗森 这是我们
通过项链找到的定位

translation.en: Fly us there.
[Tony] Then we can get the code and save Mom and Dad.
translation.zh:
然后我们就能拿回密码
并救爸爸妈妈

translation.en: Why are you still reading that book?
These are the cheat codes to life.
You shouldn't cheat the King. It'll backfire on you.
translation.zh: 不应该欺骗霸主 会弄巧反拙的

translation.en: Be smart and play fair.
translation.zh: 开动脑筋 公平竞争

translation.en: -Doesn't work. -How can you say that?
Remember when we snuck into Dad's office and found that puzzle he was working on?
translation.zh:
还记得我们偷偷溜进爸爸的办公室
发现了他在拼的那个拼图吗？

translation.en: Uh-huh. The one that was really tricky to finish.
translation.zh: 记得 很难拼完的那个

translation.en: When I solved it for him, I thought he'd be happy,
translation.zh:
我帮他拼好的时候
我以为他会很开心

translation.en: but he got mad at me for sneaking into his work, saying I was dishonest.
translation.zh: 但是他很生气 因为我偷看他的工作

translation.en: Yeah. Then he put up the tech restrictions on all our stuff.
translation.zh: 对 后来他还限制我们用高科技产品

translation.en: See? Telling the truth only got me in trouble.
translation.zh: 看到了吧？说真话只让我惹上了麻烦

translation.en: Maybe at first.
But in the end, honesty always wins.
translation.zh: 但是最终 诚实一定能赢

translation.en: King's lair up ahead!
-We're not slowing down. -Bronson, what's wrong?
translation.zh:
-飞机没有减速
-布朗森 怎么回事？

translation.en: We're gonna crash into that wall!
-That wall isn't really there. -Oh.
Polygon-based architecture.
translation.zh: 以多边形为基础的建筑

translation.en: Just like in old video games.
translation.zh: 就像以前的电子游戏一样

translation.en: This guy is living the dream.
translation.zh: 这家伙简直像活在梦里一样

translation.en: [Tony] No way.
This whole place is covered in some sort of AR overlay.
translation.zh: 这整个地方都被某种增强现实覆盖了

translation.en: AR? That hologram stuff
that makes things look different than they are?
translation.zh: 看起来跟实际不一样的全息图？

translation.en: Yeah, that stuff.
Maybe these glasses can help us find Mom and Dad.
translation.zh:
也许这些眼镜
能帮我们找到爸爸妈妈

translation.en: Don't take a nap.
We have to keep trying or stop the code so we can get back to the kids.
translation.zh:
我们必须继续尝试或阻止密码
才能回到孩子们的身边

translation.en: Even if we can escape, I don't think I can stop this.
translation.zh:
就算我们能逃走
我想我也阻止不了密码

translation.en: But you made the code. Can't you unmake it?
translation.zh:
可密码是你编写的
你不能破解它吗？

translation.en: Yes and no.
Operation Fireball?
Of course. We had to take down that villain Vargos.
translation.zh:
记得 我们当时
必须拿下那个恶棍瓦戈斯

translation.en: We were supposed to destroy his lair and everything in it,
translation.zh:
我们的任务是摧毁他的据点
和里面的一切

translation.en: but I found plans for this weapon.
translation.zh: 但我找到了一个武器的设计图

translation.en: Plans for the Armageddon Code?
translation.zh: 末日危机密码的设计图？

translation.en: I… I brought the plans back home
so I could finish building the code, but I…
translation.zh: 以完成密码 可是我…

translation.en: I couldn't figure it out. I failed.
translation.zh: 我没有想通 我失败了

translation.en: -[Torrez] How did you finish it? -[Terrence] I didn't.
translation.zh: 你是怎么把它完成的？ 不是我

translation.en: Tony did.
He doesn't even really know it, but he did.
translation.zh: 连他自己都不知道 但是他完成的

translation.en: -How is that possible? -He got into my work somehow.
translation.zh:
-这怎么可能？
-他溜进了我的办公室

translation.en: He knew the plans better than I did.
translation.zh: 他比我更了解那些设计图

translation.en: He finished what I started, and I built Armageddon
translation.zh:
他完成了我开始的工作
我在那个基础上

translation.en: on top of what he gave me.
I could've told him everything, but I scolded him
translation.zh:
我本可以告诉他的
可我却训了他一通

translation.en: and put tech restrictions up to protect the code.
translation.zh:
还为了保护密码
限制他们用高科技产品

translation.en: The kids don't even know that's why
everything they love is being kept from them.
translation.zh:
我为什么要限制他们
用他们最爱的设备

translation.en: And this is all my fault.
That is quite a story.
I knew you were hiding something from me.
translation.zh: 我就知道你有事瞒着我

translation.en: But it doesn't matter who made what.
translation.zh: 但是谁做了什么并不重要

translation.en: I've taken the missing piece from your children,
translation.zh:
我从你们孩子手上
拿到了缺失的那一半

translation.en: and within minutes, the code will be ready to fire. [laughs]
translation.zh: 几分钟后 密码就能启动

translation.en: Your kids failed you.
Or maybe you failed them.
translation.zh: 或者是你们辜负了他们

translation.en: So Tony made the code.
Now no one in the world can stop me.
translation.zh: 现在这世界上就没人能阻止我了

translation.en: Tony! Tony made it!
There's a computer behind this panel.
translation.zh: 这个面板后面有一台电脑

translation.en: Bronson, we need your help.
translation.zh: 布朗森 我们需要你帮忙

translation.en: Now we can download a map of this place.
translation.zh: 现在我们可以下载这里的地图了

translation.en: Look. The prison cells are right by the King's VR pods
translation.zh:
你看 牢房就在
霸主的虚拟现实舱旁边

translation.en: he showed on that video at school.
translation.zh: 他在学校放的视频里展示过的

translation.en: I hear footsteps.
-[Tony] Just don't look down. -[Patty] I might've already looked down.
translation.zh: 千万别往下看 我可能已经低头看了

translation.en: [The King] Armageddon is close to being combined.
translation.zh: 末日危机密码即将合并

translation.en: Then it will be unstoppable.
translation.zh: 一旦完成 它将无人能挡

translation.en: The King is already combining the code. We have to find Mom and Dad now.
translation.zh:
霸主已经在合并密码了
我们必须马上找到爸爸妈妈

translation.en: Those Hyskor characters are just AR overlays too.
translation.zh:
那些《海斯科》里的角色
也只是增强现实的覆盖物

translation.en: They're actually robots.
Those robots aren't so scary.
-We need to jump. -What? Are you crazy?
-[Tony] We need to jump. -No!
[Tony] Those things are totally scary.
[Patty] This way to the prison cells.
-[Torrez] Is that… -[Terrence] Our kids.
-[Terrence] Patty! -[Patty] Mom! Dad!
Oh, my babies!
Are you safe?
Stand back.
I'm setting my Magna Boots from pull to push.
translation.zh: 我用我的反重力靴把门踹开

translation.en: -[Torrez] Oh! -[Terrence] Well done! -[Terrence] Well done! -[Torrez] That's my girl. Oh!
translation.zh:
-太棒了！真不愧是我的女儿
-干得漂亮！

translation.en: I can't believe you found us. How… How did you even get here?
translation.zh:
真不敢相信你们找到了我们
你们是怎么来到这里的？

translation.en: Aw. Bronson flew us in the Super Ducky that we jacked from the OSS.
translation.zh:
布朗森开我们从超级间谍组织
偷来的超级鸭送我们过来的

translation.en: -I am so proud… -That is… -…in this moment -…just beyond, my sweets.
translation.zh:
-此刻我太骄傲了
-你们太惊人了 亲爱的

translation.en: [Heck Knight] Armageddon is combined. Launching in six minutes.
translation.zh: 末日危机密码已合并 六分钟后启动

translation.en: What now, master spies? The clock's ticking.
Actually, I have a really solid plan inspired by our greatest mission.
translation.zh:
其实我有一个非常可靠的计划
灵感来自于我们最伟大的任务

translation.en: -Operation Fireball. -You got it.
What was this Operation Fireball exactly?
Our mission was to infiltrate the operation of an evil man named Vargos.
translation.zh:
我们当年的任务是潜入
一个叫“瓦戈斯”的坏人的行动

translation.en: [Terrence] And we were able to infiltrate his lair by knocking on the door.
translation.zh:
我们成功潜入了他的据点
方法是…敲门

translation.en: You just knocked on his door?
-With a truck. -Big truck.
We used our gadgets to get past the guards.
translation.zh: 我们用装备躲过了守卫

translation.en: Friendly gadgets?
I went to stop the superweapon while your mother negotiated with Vargos.
translation.zh:
我趁你们的妈妈跟瓦戈斯谈判时
去了阻止他的超级武器

translation.en: "Negotiate"? You mean "beat up," don't you?
That sums it up. I couldn't stop the bomb in time.
translation.zh:
差不多那意思
我无法及时停止他的炸弹

translation.en: I had to stall just long enough…
translation.zh: 我必须拖延足够长的时间…

translation.en: So that we can set our own bomb off instead.
We wiped out Vargos's operation in one glorious…
translation.zh:
我们破坏了瓦戈斯的计划
把它化成了一个绚烂的…

translation.en: [both] Fireball.
-I love you. -I love you more.
Awesome.
Not awesome! You could've found a better way.
translation.zh:
一点都不棒！
你们本该找到更好的办法

translation.en: I'd… Hmm? How?
You could've asked nicely to see Mr. Vargos.
translation.zh:
你们可以客气地
请求跟瓦戈斯先生见面

translation.en: You could've used a thought bubble to keep the guards entertained.
translation.zh: 可以用思想泡泡来逗守卫们开心

translation.en: You could've gotten an understanding of his interior-design sense.
translation.zh: 你们可以了解他的室内设计品味

translation.en: You could've intervened in his plan with a softer touch.
translation.zh: 用更温和的方式干预他的计划

translation.en: I guess we… could've considered that.
translation.zh: 我想我们当时确实可以考虑一下

translation.en: So that maybe instead of Operation Fireball,
translation.zh: 火球行动”并不是不可避免的

translation.en: it could be Operation Peace and Harmony.
translation.zh: 它本该能成为“和平与和谐行动”

translation.en: -That's my child. -Yeah. Yeah. Certainly not mine.
translation.zh:
-不愧是我的孩子
-对 肯定不是我的

translation.en: -[Heck Knight] Armageddon in four minutes. -We have four minutes left.
translation.zh:
-末日危机四分钟后启动
-只剩四分钟了

translation.en: I could come up with a fantastic plan if I had a map of this place.
translation.zh:
如果有这个地方的地图
我就能想出一个绝妙的计划

translation.en: -Boop. -[gasps] Yes! Well done.
We have to get to these computer terminals to stall for time.
translation.zh:
我们得去找到这两个电脑终端
拖延时间

translation.en: Let's go.
-[Tony] That's the whole plan? -Yup.
translation.zh:
-快走
-就这计划？ 对 我们要争取时间
向超级间谍组织发出求救信号

translation.en: We're gonna buy some time to send a signal to OSS for help.
translation.zh:
对 我们要争取时间
向超级间谍组织发出求救信号

translation.en: -We stall when we can beat the King? -Armageddon is being armed.
translation.zh:
我们能打败霸主
你们却只想拖延时间？ 末日危机即将启动
我们现在只能拖延它

translation.en: Nothing we can do now except slow down its final process. Let's split up.
translation.zh:
末日危机即将启动
我们现在只能拖延它 分头行动 托尼跟我 你带上帕蒂

translation.en: -I'll take Tony. You take Patty. -They have Magna Boots.
translation.zh:
分头行动 托尼跟我 你带上帕蒂 他们有反重力靴
他们才可以进入分叉路

translation.en: -They can access the branching path. -No, no, no, no.
translation.zh:
他们有反重力靴
他们才可以进入分叉路 -不行 对他们来说太危险了
-你说得对

translation.en: -It's too dangerous for them. -You're right.
translation.zh:
-不行 对他们来说太危险了
-你说得对

translation.en: Come here a second.
We can do this.
[Patty] Yeah.
-Okay. Hey, you two stick together, okay? -Okay.
translation.zh:
-好 你们俩绝对不能分开 好吗？
-好

translation.en: -And stick to the plan. -[Patty] Got it.
We love you too!
-I immediately regret this. -So much.
-Yeah. We should go. -Yep.
-I need eyes in the hall. -On it.
[gasps] Tony, we gotta hurry!
[Tony] I'm trying to beat Hyskor to stall for time.
translation.zh: 我在尝试打败《海斯科》来拖延时间

translation.en: You lost.
-I've got a new plan. -What new plan?
translation.zh:
-我有一个新计划
-什么新计划？

translation.en: If we get to this elevator, we can stop the countdown.
translation.zh:
如果我们能去到这个电梯那里
就能停止倒计时

translation.en: That's not what they told us to do. We have to stick to the plan.
translation.zh:
这不是爸妈让我们做的
我们必须照计划行事

translation.en: We have to do whatever it takes to win.
translation.zh: 必须不惜一切代价赢得胜利

translation.en: I think you were right, Patty.
translation.zh: 帕蒂 我觉得你说得对

translation.en: About what?
We're not gonna make it.
That must be the central computer. I can use it to stop Armageddon.
translation.zh:
那一定是中央计算机
我可以用它来阻止末日危机

translation.en: Wait a minute.
I know this.
I made this.
You made the Armageddon Code?
translation.zh: 末日危机密码是你做的？

translation.en: Sort of. It was that weird puzzle from Dad's work, but it wasn't a puzzle.
translation.zh:
算是吧 就是爸爸办公室里
那个奇怪的拼图 但其实不是拼图

translation.en: -It was the plans for Armageddon Code. -How are you gonna stop it though?
translation.zh:
-是末日危机密码的设计图
-可你要怎么让它停下来？

translation.en: The same way I solved it.
The last part of the plan had a trick to it,
translation.zh: 设计图的最后部分有个障眼法

translation.en: where you couldn't tell if it was completed
translation.zh: 让人看不出拼图是否已完成

translation.en: because you had to do the same steps backwards.
translation.zh: 因为必须逆向重复之前的步骤

translation.en: That's how I'm going to break it.
translation.zh: 我就用这个方法破解它

translation.en: Okay. What do I do?
-Press that button. -Which one?
-We're out of time! -Almost there.
You couldn't tell if the code was completed or not.
translation.zh: 你无法判断密码是否完成

translation.en: Tony, wait! Stop! It's a trick!
translation.zh: 托尼 等等！住手！这是圈套！

translation.en: [Heck Knight] You have armed Armageddon.
[Tony] What?
I just stopped it.
Wrong, Tony.
You've put it together for me.
translation.zh: 你帮我把它合并了起来

translation.en: -Mom! Dad! -Oh, the whole family!
You weren't able to complete the code yourself, were you? Even after you got the missing piece.
translation.zh:
即使你拿到了缺失的部分
也无法完成密码

translation.en: Only the true code creator can activate the world-conquering potential.
translation.zh:
只有真正的密码创造者
才能激活征服世界的潜能

translation.en: I made this fake countdown so you, Tony, could combine it for me.
translation.zh:
我做了这个假倒计时
引诱托尼帮我合并了密码

translation.en: Thank you.
We downloaded Hyskor last night and caused all of this.
translation.zh:
我们昨晚下载了《海斯科》
才导致了这一切

translation.en: No, no, no. You just wanted to play a game.
translation.zh: 不 你们只是想玩个游戏而已

translation.en: You didn't cause this.
They did.
And so did the rest of the world.
Vargos was my father.
From Operation Fireball?
He was a genius that used his technology to make our home country a better place.
translation.zh:
他是个天才 用他的技术
让我们的祖国变得更美好

translation.en: Sure, his head wasn't always in the right spot,
translation.zh: 的确 他有时会有些不太好的心思

translation.en: but someone could have helped guide him.
translation.zh: 但有些人本可以引导他的

translation.en: But you OSS agents laid waste to everything,
translation.zh:
可你们这些超级间谍组织的特工
毁了一切

translation.en: stole Armageddon as a weapon for yourselves.
translation.zh:
把末日危机密码据为己有
用它作为武器

translation.en: He would've improved the world with his creation.
translation.zh: 他本可以用自己的创造改善这个世界

translation.en: But instead, my father spent the last days of his life
translation.zh:
可我父亲却在一个
无人知晓的监狱里度过了

translation.en: in some top secret prison.
I never saw him again.
I'm so sorry, but we can't let you do this.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 但我们不能让你这么做

translation.en: The only way to make this world better is by force,
translation.zh:
让这个世界变好的唯一方法
就是靠武力

translation.en: and my father's creation will do just that.
translation.zh: 而我父亲的创造能做到这一点

translation.en: Armageddon Code, select target.
translation.zh: 末日危机密码 选择目标

translation.en: The world.
This entire broken planet will be fixed by Hyskor,
translation.zh:
这整个残破的星球
将会被《海斯科》修复

translation.en: a game that makes you a better person as you play.
translation.zh:
这个游戏能让玩家
在玩的过程中变得更好

translation.en: Because I'm in control.
Enjoy your life
of play.
No.
We did this all wrong.
Yeah, we did.
I'm sorry I wasn't a good spy like you wanted me to be.
translation.zh:
对不起 我没有成为
你们所期待的优秀间谍

translation.en: No. I'm sorry, Patty.
translation.zh: 不 帕蒂 我才该感到抱歉

translation.en: With your honest heart,
you are better than I will ever be.
And you are so much more than I could have hoped for.
translation.zh: 而且你已经比我期待的要优秀得多

translation.en: I wanted to win, Dad, but I ended the world.
translation.zh:
我想赢的 爸爸
但却终结了这个世界

translation.en: No. No, you didn't, pal. You didn't. I did.
translation.zh: 你没有 不是你的错 都怪我

translation.en: When you brought me the code, and I didn't tell you the truth.
translation.zh:
你把密码给我的时候
我没有告诉你真相

translation.en: I'm so, so, so, so sorry.
Hey. How about you two show us how to play this Hyskor game, huh?
translation.zh:
嘿 要不你们俩
教我们玩《海斯科》吧？

translation.en: We got nothing else to do now that the world as we know it is over.
translation.zh:
反正我们的世界已经结束了
我们也无事可做

translation.en: Wait. There might still be a way we can win this.
translation.zh: 等等 也许我们还有一个办法能赢

translation.en: -Oh… -But we can't stop the King anymore.
translation.zh: 但我们不已经能阻止霸主了

translation.en: Well, not physically, obviously, but we can stop him virtually, can't we?
translation.zh:
在物质世界里不能
但能在虚拟世界里阻止他 不是吗？

translation.en: Look. The King is using this VR pod to control Armageddon.
translation.zh:
你们看 霸主正在用这个虚拟现实舱
来控制末日危机密码

translation.en: He is inside the game.
But if we use these VR pods,
translation.zh: 但如果我们用这些虚拟现实舱

translation.en: then we can beat him the same way you beat Hyskor.
translation.zh:
就可以用你打败《海斯科》的方式
来打败他

translation.en: Reach the end of the world, defeat the last player standing, win the crown.
translation.zh: 打败最后一个玩家 赢取王冠

translation.en: -Yeah. -This sounds crazy.
It is crazy.
Yeah.
So let's do it.
I… I… I…
-[Torrez] That's your child. -[Terrence] Wait.
-[Tony] Back. Patty, come here! -Patty!
translation.zh:
-回来 帕蒂 过来！
-帕蒂！

translation.en: Cute overload.
They're not so bad. They're just cute little beep-boops.
translation.zh:
它们没那么坏
它们只是可爱的小机器人

translation.en: Can you help us play against the King in Hyskor?
translation.zh:
你们能在《海斯科》里
帮我们对付的霸主吗？

translation.en: You're right, Patty. He's controlling Armageddon from inside the game.
translation.zh:
你说得对 帕蒂
他在游戏里控制着末日危机

translation.en: But if we beat him before he locks us out, we can save the world.
translation.zh:
若我们能在他禁止我们进入前打败他
我们就能拯救世界

translation.en: Here's my plan.
We go in, but no cheats, no tricks,
translation.zh: 我们进去 但不能作弊 不能耍花招

translation.en: no rat skills.
-We play fair together. -Wait, we go into the video game?
translation.zh: 我们一起公平作战 我们要进电子游戏里去？

translation.en: -Yeah. -I think we need to regroup.
translation.zh:
-我们得重新组织力量
-没时间了

translation.en: -There's no time. -We should call the OSS agents.
translation.zh:
-我们得重新组织力量
-没时间了 我们应该通知超级间谍组织
用间谍的方式解决问题

translation.en: Figure this out the spy way.
translation.zh:
我们应该通知超级间谍组织
用间谍的方式解决问题

translation.en: I'm not following the spy playbook anymore.
translation.zh: 我再也不会按间谍的方式行事了

translation.en: Patty's been right all this time. I trust her.
translation.zh: 帕蒂一直以来都是对的 我相信她

translation.en: -Then let's play. -Let's go.
[Patty] Dad, you know how you always tell us video games will fry our brain?
translation.zh:
爸爸 你总是吓唬我们说
电子游戏会搞坏我们的脑子

translation.en: -Yeah. -If we lose…
-This game might actually fry our brains. -[Patty] Yeah.
translation.zh:
-这游戏也许真的会搞坏我们的脑子
-是的

translation.en: -Wait, what'd they say? -[chuckles] It's… She didn't…
translation.zh:
-等等 他们说什么？
-这是…她没有…

translation.en: -We're gonna have fun. Let's have fun. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-我们会玩得很开心的 好好玩吧
-好吧

translation.en: We're trapped!
No, Dad. It's an elevator. The game's about to start.
translation.zh:
不是啦 爸爸 这是一部电梯
游戏即将开始

translation.en: Tony, you're playing as Rat Thickskull!
translation.zh: 托尼 你的角色是胖头鼠

translation.en: -And you're playing as Florella! -Wait, what are these outfits?
translation.zh:
-你的是弗洛瑞拉
-等等 这些是什么服装？

translation.en: The game made you play as a character called Tayanna.
translation.zh: 游戏让你扮演一个叫“塔亚娜”的角色

translation.en: [Tony] And the game made you play as a character called Itza.
Got it.
Here we are.
Where are we?
We're at the end of the world. The finale of the world's most challenging game.
translation.zh:
世界尽头
世界上最具挑战性的游戏的决赛

translation.en: The ground is cracking. We have to go now!
translation.zh: 地面裂开了 赶快逃跑！

translation.en: -All right. -This game is not fun.
Step one,
we have to get to that giant statue to find the King.
translation.zh:
我们必须去到那个巨大的雕像那里
才能找到霸主

translation.en: -[Terrence] Are you sure this is right? -[Torrez] Just keep up!
translation.zh:
-你们确定这个方向对吗？
-跟上

translation.en: I'm working on it!
[groans] And there goes my back.
[Tony] Now we have to fight a few bad guys to get to the statue.
translation.zh:
现在我们得打倒几个坏人
才能去到雕像那里

translation.en: [Patty] And with only nine minutes left.
Wait. Why are there so many of them?
translation.zh: 等等 怎么会有这么多坏人？

translation.en: [Tony] It's a game.
It's more fun that way.
[Tony] If we fall, we lose.
[Patty] If we don't work as a team, we lose.
[Terrence] How do we not lose?
Just think of this as an ambush.
translation.zh: 你就把这当成是一个埋伏

translation.en: Goody.
[Patty] How about a skeleton?
Two skeletons!
Use your bracelet.
It's like a spy gadget.
-[Patty] See? -Whoa.
-[Tony] Use your hammer to hit, Dad! -Oh!
translation.zh: 爸爸 用你的锤子来攻击

translation.en: Your dad's pretty cool, huh?
Is that a flaming skull?
[Patty] Get lost! You too.
Flaming skulls!
Go, Mom!
Thank you, Mom.
I'll always have your back.
translation.zh: 我永远都会当你的后盾

translation.en: -[gasps] Duck! -Whoa!
I upgraded.
Look at you.
Florella gets stronger as you work through the game.
translation.zh:
弗洛瑞拉会随着游戏进行
而变得更强大

translation.en: She sure does.
So is that it? Did we win?
No. It's time for step two. We have to beat the last player standing.
translation.zh:
不 是时候进行第二步了
我们必须打败最后一位玩家

translation.en: The King.
[Tony] But only one of us can go in to face him.
translation.zh: 但我们只能有一个人进去挑战他

translation.en: The rest of us have to defeat his champion,
translation.zh: 其他人则必须打败他的卫士

translation.en: the Heck Knight.
[Patty] You're our best player, Tony. You're the only one
translation.zh:
托尼 你是我们当中最好的玩家 只有你能打败霸主
而不耗尽所有的生命值

translation.en: who can beat the King without losing all your health.
translation.zh:
只有你能打败霸主
而不耗尽所有的生命值

translation.en: What? We have health?
Yeah. Yours is low, Dad. Real low.
translation.zh: 对 爸爸 你的生命值很低 超低

translation.en: -Oh. I thought I was just losing weight. -No. Come on!
translation.zh:
我以为是我的体重在下降 -不是 快走
-好吧

translation.en: Wait.
I don't know if I can win this without my tricks or cheats.
translation.zh:
如果不用把戏或作弊
我不知道我能不能赢

translation.en: What if I lose?
Worth it.
[The King] Now, while everyone plays Hyskor,
translation.zh: 现在所有人都在玩《海斯科》

translation.en: I can improve the world.
translation.zh: 我可以让这个世界变得更好

translation.en: Deleting all nuclear launch codes.
translation.zh: 删除所有核弹发射密码

translation.en: No need for that in my world.
And…
Hello.
Another player ready to cheat.
translation.zh: 又一个准备作弊的玩家

translation.en: I've been watching your every move from this throne,
translation.zh:
我一直在这个宝座上
观察你的一举一动

translation.en: and as I have designed my games from here, now I'm designing Earth.
translation.zh:
我的游戏就是在这里设计的
现在我也在这里设计地球

translation.en: [The King] You are so impressive.
I don't think I could even stop you kids out there in the real world.
translation.zh:
我觉得在现实世界里
我甚至无法阻止你们这些孩子

translation.en: But… in here,
I can never lose.
If you lower my health to zero, you win.
translation.zh: 你让我的生命值归零你就赢

translation.en: But if I lower yours…
translation.zh: 但如果我耗光你的生命值…

translation.en: game over.
Careful, Tony. The staff is Rat Thickskull's worst weapon.
translation.zh:
托尼 要小心哦
法杖是胖头鼠最弱的武器

translation.en: Well,
it's a good thing I'm not Rat Thickskull.
Because Rat's not good at a lot of things.
translation.zh: 因为胖头鼠在很多方面都做得不好

translation.en: He's a scoundrel.
He does anything to win.
translation.zh: 他会为了胜利不择手段

translation.en: And that's why today,
I'm playing as myself.
Shall we?
[Tony] First of all, "the King"?
Really?
If you can create your own world,
translation.zh: 如果你能创造自己的世界

translation.en: why not make yourself the king? [echoes]
translation.zh: 为什么不让自己当霸主？

translation.en: You'll become the court jester when I'm done with you.
translation.zh: 等我收拾了你 你就会变成宫廷小丑

translation.en: [Heck Knight] I cannot be defeated.
Well, remember me?
Yeah. I didn't have this big ol' fist then, did I?
translation.zh: 对 我之前没有这个大拳头 对吧？

translation.en: Catch me…
[Torrez] Oh, baby.
Nice catch.
But I love you.
-We have to beat that Heck Knight. -Honey.
translation.zh:
-我们必须打败那个赫克骑士
-亲爱的

translation.en: Let's do Operation Fireball, but not our way.
translation.zh:
我们来完成火球行动吧
但不是用我们的方式

translation.en: [both] Patty's way.
-You have been such a great challenge. -We appreciate you.
translation.zh:
-你真是个好对手
-我们很欣赏你

translation.en: -Keep up the good work. -You're golden.
Stay back! Don't come over here!
-The ground is unstable. You'll fall. -[Heck Knight] Why would I trust you?
translation.zh:
-地面不稳 你会掉下去的
-我为什么要信你？

translation.en: Because you can.
You did it. You found a better way.
translation.zh: 你们做到了 你们找到了更好的方法

translation.en: You saved the Heck Knight.
Whoa!
[Heck Knight] Florella,
henceforth, I will follow you,
translation.zh: 从今以后 我会追随你

translation.en: for your integrity is pure.
translation.zh: 因为你诚实正直 令人敬佩

translation.en: We did our part, but we're running out of time.
translation.zh: 我们完成了任务 但时间不多了

translation.en: Tony has to win. Now.
-Whoo! -Yes, Tony!
-No! -What?!
[The King] Come on, Rat.
Use your tricks and cheats.
translation.zh: 使出你的伎俩 作弊吧

translation.en: Tony's in trouble.
Dad, don't.
I have to help him.
Your father's breaking the rules!
Dad!
-No, Dad. I have to do this myself. -[whirring, beeping]
translation.zh: 爸爸 不能 这事只能由我自己来完成

translation.en: [Tony, breathlessly] No… cheating.
But I played fair.
It doesn't matter.
-No! -Oh no! No, no!
Victory is mine!
I never thought anyone would ever earn that.
translation.zh: 我从没想到有人能拿到它

translation.en: -The One Hit. -[Torrez] What?
[Patty] Tony just received the legendary One Hit,
translation.zh: 托尼刚刚获得了著名的“致命一击”

translation.en: the mythical ability hidden within the game.
translation.zh: 传说中隐藏在游戏里的绝杀技

translation.en: How did you…
Maybe because I played the game like my sister said.
translation.zh:
也许是因为我听了我妹妹的建议
没有作弊

translation.en: I believe her now.
No. No. No!
-Yeah! -Yay!
[Tony] You lost.
You won fair and square, but I can't let you stop Armageddon.
translation.zh:
你赢得光明正大
但我不能让你停止末日危机密码

translation.en: It's the only way to fix this world.
translation.zh: 这是修复这个世界的唯一方法

translation.en: You could have removed the One Hit from the game, but you didn't.
translation.zh:
你本可以把致命一击
从游戏中删除 但你没有

translation.en: Yes, but I stopped trusting this world to make itself a better place.
translation.zh:
是 但我已不再相信
这个世界能靠自己的力量变好

translation.en: The only way to do it is by force.
translation.zh: 唯一的办法就是用武力

translation.en: Your games never forced me to play fair.
translation.zh: 你的游戏从来没有逼我公平竞争

translation.en: My sister inspired me to.
So now we just have to inspire the world to be better.
translation.zh:
所以现在我们只需要激励
这个世界变得更好

translation.en: You know, instead of forcing everyone to be gamers like us.
translation.zh:
而不是强迫所有人
变成像我们这样的游戏玩家

translation.en: Like us.
It's true.
You and your sister have shown that maybe we do have the power to
translation.zh:
你和你妹妹已经证明了
也许我们有能力…

translation.en: inspire them.
He's running out of time!
Shut down Armageddon.
Yes.
Okay.
Yes! Yes, Tony!
I knew you could do it.
[Heck Knight] Tremendous effort.
Well done.
Tony.
You showed me the goodness I thought I could only find in a game world,
translation.zh:
你们让我看到了
我以为只能在游戏世界里找到的美德

translation.en: and I… I thank you.
-You've raised some wonderful children. -We did.
translation.zh:
-你们养育了两个很优秀的孩子
-是的

translation.en: Congratulations, agents. You have defeated your enemy.
translation.zh: 探员们 恭喜你们打败了敌人

translation.en: -What? -Now the King must face his sentence.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-现在霸主必须接受刑罚

translation.en: -There's a better way. -What?
Throwing him in prison won't make him a good person.
translation.zh: 把他关进监狱并不能让他成为好人

translation.en: -Then where do we send him? -This is why we need to make a change.
translation.zh:
-那把他送到哪里去？
-这是我们需要促成改变的原因

translation.en: Inside his own game.
The only reason we won
is because his game makes you better as you play.
translation.zh:
是他的游戏能让人
在玩的过程中变得更好

translation.en: -Hyskor has all the guidance he needs. -That's not how we work in the OSS.
translation.zh:
-《海斯科》能给他最好的引导
-这不符合超级间谍组织的做法

translation.en: Actually, it is.
Excuse me?
On page two of How To Be a Spy,
it states that the high-level OSS agent that catches the enemy
translation.zh: 逮到敌人的超级间谍组织高级探员

translation.en: is best suited to decide their judgment.
translation.zh: 最有资格决定对敌人的判决

translation.en: And because we caught the enemy and you didn't,
translation.zh: 而且是我们抓住了敌人 不是你们

translation.en: that makes us the high-level agents.
translation.zh: 所以我们才是高级特工

translation.en: -[character] Ooh! -[Heck Knight] Radical!
-Smart kid. -Yeah.
Therefore, the King will be locked inside his lair under OSS surveillance
translation.zh:
因此霸主将被锁在他的老巢里
在他打败《海斯科》之前

translation.en: until he beats Hyskor.
-[Heck Knight] Yes! [laughs] -[cheering]
What should have been done for your father
translation.zh: 你希望为你父亲做的事

translation.en: we're going to do for you.
You're saving me?
You'll be saving yourself by working through your own game.
translation.zh:
你可以通过在你的游戏中磨炼
来拯救你自己

translation.en: And with game theory, anything can be fixed.
translation.zh: 用游戏理论任何事物都可以修复

translation.en: Or anyone.
Watch me on the screen.
translation.zh: 看我在屏幕上的表现吧

translation.en: Thank you.
I never thought our kids would show us how to be great spies.
translation.zh:
我从没想过我们的孩子
会教我们如何成为优秀的间谍

translation.en: They showed us how to be something better.
translation.zh: 他们教会了我们如何成为更好的人

translation.en: Devlin, two decades of service with you in the OSS has been an honor, but
translation.zh:
德夫林 很荣幸跟你
在超级间谍组织共事了20年 但是…

translation.en: we quit.
Excuse me?
We'd rather figure out our own way to save the world.
translation.zh: 我们宁愿自己想办法来拯救世界

translation.en: Honestly and together.
translation.zh: 用诚实的方式 全家人联手

translation.en: Sir. The Armageddon Code.
translation.zh: 长官 这是末日危机密码

translation.en: -Is this the only copy? -Yes, it is.
-[Devlin] We don't need it. -[chip crunches]
translation.zh: 我们已经不再需要它了

translation.en: Not in the new OSS. You might like some of the changes we'll be making,
translation.zh:
在新的超级间谍组织里不需要
你们可能会喜欢我们未来的一些改变

translation.en: to turn the OSS into a more effective and honest job.
translation.zh:
让超级间谍组织
做更有成效、更诚实的工作

translation.en: -[Torrez] Then we're staying. -See you at your desks Monday morning?
translation.zh:
-那我们就留下来
-周一早上办公室见？

translation.en: All of your desks.
All of our desks! Oh! So proud of you, buddies.
translation.zh:
我们四位！
真为你们感到骄傲 孩子们

translation.en: [Heck Knight chortles] Well played.
-[beeps] -Well, Spy Kids.
Good morning, Devlin.
I have a little progress report on your last mission.
translation.zh:
我有一份关于你们
上一个任务的进展报告

translation.en: [reporter] Not only has the world gone back to normal,
but the one who caused Armageddon
translation.zh: 而且造成末日危机的人

translation.en: is now helping people with the use of technology,
translation.zh: 正在利用高科技帮助人们

translation.en: calling himself the Court Jester.
He did it.
He beat his game.
You ready for more?
-[Patty] Oh yeah. -[beeps]
